member.name: IDWriteFontFamily1.GetFont
member.summary: Gets a font given its zero-based index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the font in the font list.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFamily1.GetFontFaceReference
member.summary: Gets a font face reference given its zero-based index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the font in the font list.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font face reference object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFamily1.GetFontLocality
member.summary: Gets the current location of a font given its zero-based index.
member.param: Zero-based index of the font in the font list.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the location of the specified font.

member.name: IDWriteFontFamily1
member.summary: Represents a family of related fonts.
